adverbs.description: discreetly (comparative more discreetly, superlative most discreetly)

entries.meaning: Acting in a discreet manner; acting in a way that respects privacy or secrecy; quietly
examples: Mao was animated and following every nuance of the conversation, but I could see that he was also becoming very tired. Chou had been discreetly glancing at his watch with increasing frequency, so I decided that I should try to bring the session to a close.
